p: Time needed for the IPCC is a particular problem for early career authors. While IPCC authorship can be helpful in increasing one’s national and international reputation, it may not increase your publication record: “for junior colleagues the barriers included a reduction in their publications given the large amount of time the process takes over the course of the 2-y cycle. The loss of individual productivity could influence their advancement in academe, which does reward publication over service, regardless of its importance.” One woman reported that as a younger author “I was petrified, and often silent in author meetings.”
